name: The appearance of respectability IV
description: The appearance of respectability IV (2021),by @pgervois. MPEG-4 movie, 1,080 × 1,080 pixels. Six lives intersect in The Appearance of Respectability series. Six individuals doing their best, with no joy or fear, to project the appropriate image to their professional and personal environment and scrupulously following established social guidelines. The Appearance of Respectability dissects the blandness and lack of emotions methodically guiding our quest for social conformity. www.pierregervois.com
